name: Othello Let's Go | 一起翻转棋
name_original: Othello Let's Go | 一起翻转棋
description:
Othello (Reversi) Let's Go is a highly-acclaimed strategy board game for all ages. It takes a minute to learn and a lifetime to master!

Four different game modes are available for you to play:
Classic Solo
World class AI with 8 difficulty levels, suits for both beginners and advanced players.


Endgame Challenge
Solve 60 carefully selected endgame puzzles. Give it a try and show yourself you are a truly Othello master.


Lights Out
Classic electronic game, Lights Out. Can you flip all pieces to black on the board?


Local co-op for Two Players
Do play with your family and friends!
